PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-04762011-03-25,  ,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectGovernment aggregate borrowing limit
PrecisOrder specifying $300 billion as the aggregate principal amount of money that the Minister may borrow in the period beginning on April 1, 2011 and ending on March 31, 2012 through the issue of bonds, notes and treasury bills.
AttachmentsAttachment
